sentences.english: The sentiment also may find Predestiny, into one.
sentences.chinese: 情亦願，覓得有緣成佳偶。

sentences.english: The pair married in 2008 at their Beverly Hills estate.
sentences.chinese: 這對佳偶於2008年在她們的貝弗利山莊別墅完婚。

sentences.english: The couple eventually married, in November 1999.
sentences.chinese: 這對佳偶終於在1999年11月走上了紅地毯。

sentences.english: I have compared thee, O my love, to a company of horses in Pharaoh's chariots.
sentences.chinese: 我的佳偶，我將你比法老車上套的駿馬。

sentences.english: As a lily among brambles, so is my love among maiden.
sentences.chinese: 我的佳偶在女子中，好象百合在荊棘內。

sentences.english: This is a great way to meet a suitor.
sentences.chinese: 這是遇到佳偶的好辦法。

sentences.english: Kim by Couple.net, one of the leading matchmaking agencies in South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 佳偶網絡公司是韓國首屈一指的婚介機構。

sentences.english: We spend a huge amount of time and energy trying to find that special some one.
sentences.chinese: 爲尋佳偶，我們花大量時間和精力。

sentences.english: The lovely couple is now here, such a perfect match.
sentences.chinese: 新人就在我們的面前，真是佳偶天成一對碧人。

sentences.english: Love Line has matched thousands of couples.
sentences.chinese: “愛情熱線”撮合了許多對佳偶。

sentences.english: As a lily among thorns, So is my love among the daughters.
sentences.chinese: 我的佳偶在女子中，好像百合花在荊棘中。

sentences.english: As the lily among thorns, so is my love among the daughters.
sentences.chinese: 我的佳偶在女子中，好像百合花在荊棘內。

definition: good karma/opportune connection with marriage partner
to have an affinity with each other (idiom)/to find each other congenial
to tie the knot (idiom)/to get married
talented man and beautiful woman/ideal couple

pinyin: you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3

definition: in perfect harmony/in sync/lit. qin and se sing in harmony
(to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
